revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen|Classic attack}} '''A_IceGuyAttack'''
(''no parameter'')
Spawns two {{Class|IceGuyFX}} projectiles 40 map units from the actor's feet. The projectiles are offset by half of the calling actor's radius to the calling actor's left and right. Finally, the {{Property|AttackSound}} is played on the Weapon channel. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|IceGuy}} and derived classes.
